whatNext.p1: If we approve your claim, we'll pay the money into the bank account you chose.
whatNext.p2: If we do not approve your claim, we'll contact you to let you know what to do next.
whatNext.link: save and print a copy of your claims submission (opens in a new tab).

feedback.link: Tell us what you think of this service - give your feedback (opens in a new tab).
